definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: It was such a simple answer that Koppel had to smile.
sentences.chinese: 回答得如此簡單，科佩爾不禁笑了。

sentences.english: "You look fine, " Koppel said when the tape began to roll.
sentences.chinese: “你氣色不錯，”帶子開始轉動時科佩爾說。

sentences.english: Six patients had recently come forward to complain that Copperman had molested them.
sentences.chinese: 最近已有6名患者指控科佩爾曼對她們進行過性騷擾。

sentences.english: Before they started, Koppel asked about the disease's progression.
sentences.chinese: 正式採訪開始前，科佩爾詢問了疾病的進展情況。

sentences.english: Before the show ended, Morrie read Koppel one of the letters he'd received.
sentences.chinese: 採訪快要結束時，莫里給科佩爾唸了一封他收到的信。

sentences.english: "Here's how my emotions go, " Morrie told Koppel.
sentences.chinese: “你可以看到我的情緒變化，”莫里對科佩爾說。“

sentences.english: "You did a good job, " Koppel said.
He told Koppel he wanted to die with serenity.
sentences.chinese: 他對科佩爾說他想安寧地死去。

sentences.english: Koppel now referred to Morrie as "a friend."
sentences.chinese: 科佩爾如今稱莫里爲“朋友”。
